FAQ: [Home Page Sections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1730774-parallax-home-page-content-layout) • [Dropdown Menu](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942350-creating-a-dropdown-menu) • [Adding Tabs](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942364-adding-tabs) • [Sale Banners](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942366-products-on-sale) • [Related Products](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942378-related-products) • [Home Page Collections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942377) • [Page of Collections](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1132818-page-of-collections) • [Content Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/942365) • [Product Page Video](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1059911) • [Adding Columns](http://support.outofthesandbox.com/customer/portal/articles/1033987)
If you need any assistance, please contact [support@outofthesandbox.com](mailto:support@outofthesandbox.com)

settings.content: Banner Images

The banner images will span the full width of the layout and utilize parallax scrolling. The first image is required and will be positioned under the header. The recommended image size is 1600x1000, while the maximum image size is 2048x2048.

settings.label: Use Header Background Color over Image?

settings.content: Featured Content Pages
The content from these pages will look great when displayed between the featured images.
Featured Links
This flexible section can feature 2-4 items that can link to any content in the shop.
Featured Collections
Display links to featured collections based on a menu of collection links.
Featured Products in Grid
Display a collection of featured products in the standard column grid layout.
Featured Products in Full Detail
Feature a single product or collection of products in full detail to purchase directly from the home page.
Blog Articles
Display recent blog articles on the home page. When editing your blog articles, you can 'add an excerpt'. Any text or images inserted into the excerpt will be displayed on your home page.
Social Feeds
Display Twitter and Instagram timeline profile feeds.

settings.label: Home Page Sidebar Enabled (next to featured products)
Display Shipping Rates Calculator on Cart Page?
Shipping Rates Calculator default country selection

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the spelling to use above, refer to your first checkout page.

settings.label: Shipping rates calculator submit button label
Shipping rates calculator submit button label when calculating
[DISQUS](http://disqus.com/) Comments Enabled (instead of Shopify's default comments)

settings.content: Blog Header Image
The recommended image size is 1400x700, while the maximum image size is 2048x2048.
The recommended image size is 1400x700, while the maximum image size is 2048x2048.
Header Image
Include the full http:// URL with your profile links:
Payment Methods
To enable this feature, you must first edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://wiki.shopify.com/Do_Tell_Where_The_Money_Is) (“Do tell where the money is”).
Although you will be able to display prices on your store front in different currencies, Shopify will still process orders in your shop's currency.
Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. [Complete list of currency codes](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Example: CAD USD.
To test this feature, set the number of days until the popup is displayed again to 0.

settings.label: Days until Popup is Displayed Again
